title: Support turns detractor into promoter
body: Last Friday, our support teammate noticed a frustrated customer on chat. She looped in engineering and success, shipped a workaround in hours, and followed up proactively. The client renewed early.

title: Warehouse team accelerates rollout
body: The warehouse ops group self-organized a weekend sprint to prepare hardware kits, unblocking five pilot customers. This cut install time by 40% and kept the Q3 plan intact.
